description: cap with large, slightly rounded crown; crown embroidered with large star motif in white, pink, green, black, yellow, blue, maroon and purple; diamond design embroidered top band in same colors; knit lower band with double diamond motif; lined with maroon fabric and various bright printed fabrics
dimension: 4 5/16 x 7 1/2 x 6 5/16 in. (10.95 x 19.05 x 16.03 cm) (without back pompon)
title: Hat
